pageContent: In tissue microarray (TMA) approximately 500 clinical formalin fixed and paraffin embedded tissue cores are reorganized into a new recipient block. Each recipient block may be sectioned up to 200 times.

metaData.source:
Does androgen deprivation improve treatment outcomes in patients with low-risk and intermediate-risk prostate cancer?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16264955/
